attributes.action: re-open the email system for communication to pm on number 10 website
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the email system that existed in 2007 and was taken down from 2008 to now should come back as ppl need to tell pm and his cabinet what is going on and ask for help in terms of their problems and give views on policy to the pm when other forms of communication fail to do so.

rejection.details: Number 10 email will return as soon as work upgrading the email system is complete.
reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
